Class_Skill_Desc_Bacchus's Water: Sends the forerunning chocobo into a Frenzied state.
Class_Skill_Desc_Breather: Increases HP recovery via healing actions by 10% for self and nearby party members.</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Breather II: Delivers an attack with a potency of 360280320280.</br>420340380340 when executed from a target's rear.</br>Can only be executed when in coeurl form.</br>Additional Effect: Grants 2 stacks of Coeurl's Fury</br>Coeurl's Fury Effect: Increases potency of Pouncing CoeurlSnap Punch by 150</br>Additional Effect: Changes form to opo-opo</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Skill_Desc_Breather III: Delivers an attack with a potency of 210 to all enemies in a straight line before you.
Class_Skill_Desc_Briar Caltrop: Surrounds your chocobo with a ring of thorns which will sap the stamina of any chocobos that enter.
Class_Skill_Desc_Choco Aether: Allows a previously used race ability to be executed again.
Class_Skill_Desc_Choco Beak: Orders chocobo to deliver an attack with a potency of 130.</br>Additional Effect: Damage over time</br>Potency: 20</br>Duration: 18s
Class_Skill_Desc_Choco Blast: Orders chocobo to deliver an attack with a potency of 170 to all enemies in a cone before it.
Class_Skill_Desc_Choco Calm: Nullifies chance of suffering critical damage.</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Choco Calm II: Increases enmity in all nearby enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Blind</br>Duration: 12s
Class_Skill_Desc_Choco Calm III: Delivers an attack with a potency of 170100140100.</br>Combo Action: Fast Blade</br>Combo Potency: 330260300260</br>Combo Bonus: Restores MP
Class_Skill_Desc_Choco Cure III: Instantly return to your current home point.
Class_Skill_Desc_Choco Drain: Significantly increases enmity generation.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.
Class_Skill_Desc_Choco Drain II: Delivers an attack with a potency of 330.</br>Beast Gauge Cost: 50
Class_Skill_Desc_Choco Drain III: Nullifies the damage penalty inflicted by Defiance.</br>Duration: 20s</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Defiance. Effect is canceled if Defiance ends.
Class_Skill_Desc_Choco Drop: Orders chocobo to deliver an attack with a potency of 150.</br>Additional Effect: Increased enmity

Class_Skill_Desc_Choco Ease III: Increases own HP recovery via healing magic by 20%.</br>Duration: 20s
Class_Skill_Desc_Choco Esuna II: Delivers a ranged attack. Recast time varies with delay value of main hand weapon.
Class_Skill_Desc_Choco Esuna III: Delivers an attack with a potency of 220150200150.

Class_Skill_Desc_Choco Medica: Orders chocobo to restore its own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 150
Class_Skill_Desc_Choco Meteor: Summons a meteor from the heavens to wreak havoc on all other chocobos.

Class_Skill_Desc_Choco Reflect III: Gesture threateningly, placing yourself at the top of a target's enmity list.
Class_Skill_Desc_Choco Regen: Orders chocobo to grant Regen to target.</br>Cure Potency: 25</br>Duration: 18s
Class_Skill_Desc_Choco Reraise II: Reduces damage taken by 10%.</br>Cannot be used with Fists of Fire or Fists of Wind, and shares a recast timer with both.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.

Class_Skill_Desc_Choco Shock II: Deals additional damage with a potency of 75 after each auto-attack. Damage affected by weapon delay.</br>Cannot be used with Shield Oath.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.
Class_Skill_Desc_Choco Shock III: Take all damage intended for another party member as long as said member remains within 10 yalms.</br>Does not activate with certain attacks.</br>Duration: 12s</br>Oath Gauge Cost: 50

Class_Skill_Desc_Choco Slash: Orders chocobo to deliver an attack with a potency of 150.

Class_Skill_Desc_Graviball: Afflicts the forerunning chocobo with Heavy.

Class_Skill_Desc_Hero Tonic: Invigorates your chocobo for 15 seconds, increasing its overall performance while nullifying any enfeeblements.
Class_Skill_Desc_Increased Stamina: Significantly increases enmity generation.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.

Class_Skill_Desc_Increased Stamina III: Renders you impervious to most attacks.</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_Level Head: Delivers an attack with a potency of 200.</br>Can only be executed when target's HP is below 20%.</br>If delivered as the killing blow, up to 20% of your maximum HP will be restored.

Class_Skill_Desc_Mimic: Increases Beast Gauge by 50.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Nascent Chaos</br>Duration: 30s</br>Nascent Chaos Effect: When Beast Gauge is 50 or greater, changes Decimate to Chaotic Cyclone and Fell Cleave to Inner Chaos</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>Can only be executed while in combat.

Class_Skill_Desc_Speedy Recovery III: Brace yourself for an enemy onslaught, preventing most attacks from reducing your HP to less than 1.</br>Duration: 10s</br>When a target is selected, halts their movement with chains.
Class_Skill_Desc_Spiderweb: Renders the chocobo running immediately behind you unable to use items.
Class_Skill_Desc_Sprint Shoes: Summons a quick burst of speed.
Class_Skill_Desc_Stamina Swapper: Interchanges your chocobo's stamina with that of a forerunning chocobo. Swap is made only if the forerunning chocobo has more stamina than yours.
Class_Skill_Desc_Stamina Tablet: Prevents stamina reduction for 10 seconds. If stamina is zero, a small amount is restored.
Class_Skill_Desc_Super Sprint: Delivers an attack with a potency of 170.</br>Can only be executed immediately after evading an attack.</br>Additional Effect: Slow +20%</br>Duration: 12s
